bio.name: Phani Sri Kalidindi
bio.text: Full Stack Developer with 2 years of experience building scalable web apps using React.js, TypeScript, .NET Core, and SQL. Passionate about clean architecture and solving real-world problems.

title: About
Me
about.text: I'm a Full Stack Developer with 2 years of experience building scalable, data-driven web applications. Iâ€™ve developed enterprise tools for Walmart, including Supply Chain and Deduction Management systems. I'm skilled in React.js, TypeScript, JavaScript (ES6+), Redux, Material UI, and Kendo UI. I integrate RESTful APIs, optimize performance with lazy loading and code splitting, and implement secure Auth0 authentication. On the backend, I'm familiar with C#, .NET Core, and SQL, and I focus on clean, maintainable code with unit testing. I enjoy solving complex problems and delivering real business value in Agile teams.
